definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: He's hooked on (ie addicted to) speed.
sentences.chinese: 他使用安非他明已成癮。

sentences.english: Usually meth is injected, having almost an immediate effect.
sentences.chinese: 一般注射甲安非他明後，差不多立刻見效。

sentences.english: Cocaine and amphetamines are less benign.
sentences.chinese: 可卡因和安非他明就不那麼良性了。

sentences.english: Stimulants are drugs such as Cocaine, and amphetamines, hallucinogens and marijuana.
sentences.chinese: 刺激劑包括可卡因，安非他明，迷幻劑和大麻。

definition: Ritalin (brand name)/methylphenidate (stimulant drug used to treat ADHD)

pinyin: jia3 ji1 an1 fei1 ta1 ming4

definition: cocaine (loanword)/also written 可卡因[ke3 ka3 yin1]
